subject: junit report problem
msgSnippet: Hi, I want to run each tests in same jvm as my test starts with one login session. If I do JVM=true, each test class will kill my login session and starts
messageBody:
Hi,
I want to run each tests in same jvm as my test starts with one login session. If I do JVM=true, each test class will kill my login session and starts login again.
If I do JVM=false, junit report complains while printing reports.
So I included all my test classes in one Class as suite and running test sucessfully using this classs only, but when I get the report I just get testName not the classsname or package name they belong to ?
can you help so that I can show test classs name /package name in my reprot.
Thanks & Regards
